item.title: GOPNIK AND THE SLAV SQUAT
item.description: Description Have you ever seen a Russian in a tracksuit (Adidas or something resembling it), a beer bottle in hand, cigarette hanging from their lips, squatting with flat feet? Then youâ€™ve likely spotted a true gopnik (m) or gopnitsa (f).
